gnu.text
Class QueueReader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.Reader
        |
        +--gnu.text.QueueReader
public class QueueReader
extends java.io.Reader

An InPort that reads from a queue. The method append can be used to write chars to the end of the queue.

lock
